HERO.TITLE: Your story in every pixel
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I'm Sonya! I specialize in authentic family photography, joyful children's portraits, and meaningful Bar/Bat Mitzvah celebrations. With a fresh and warm approach, I create timeless images that tell your unique story. Each photo session is tailored to capture genuine emotions and create memories that last a lifetime.

FEATURES.FEATURE3: About 15 edited photos for each family member
About 10 edited photos for each family member

CONTACT.TITLE: Leave a message
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

FORM.NAME: Your name
FORM.MESSAGE: Let us know what you'd like to know or when you'd like to schedule a photoshoot

CONTACT.SUCCESS: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We'll contact you soon.
